        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a rocky, arid landscape with sparse vegetation and dead trees. A character, seen from behind, is standing in the foreground, holding a staff and wearing armor. In the distance, another character or creature is visible, appearing to be engaged in combat or movement. The environment includes a stone structure on the left and pottery on the right. Red arrows point to various locations in the background, possibly indicating points of interest or objectives. The game interface displays health and stamina bars, along with various icons and controls at the bottom of the screen.
